memberdef.definition: typedef int(* pfnI2cWriteRead) (uint16_t addr, const void *write_buf, size_t num_write, void *read_buf, size_t num_read)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint16_t addr, const void *write_buf, size_t num_write, void *read_buf, size_t num_read)
memberdef.name: pfnI2cWriteRead

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* pfnI2cRead) (const void *buf, uint32_t num_bytes, uint16_t addr)
memberdef.name: pfnI2cRead

memberdef.definition: typedef int(* pfnI2cWrite) (const void *buf, uint32_t num_bytes, uint16_t addr)
memberdef.name: pfnI2cWrite

memberdef.argsstring: (const max86150_context_t *ctx, uint8_t reg, uint8_t value, uint8_t mask)
memberdef.name: max86150_set_register

briefdescription.para: Get interrupt 1 register A_FULL[7] PPG_RDY[6] ALC_OVF[5] PROX_INT[4] PWR_RDY[0].
Set FIFO almost full interrupt enable flag.
Set ambient light cancellation (ALC) overflow interrupt enable flag.
Set VDD Out-of-Range indicator interrupt flag.
Set new ECG FIFO data ready interrupt enable flag.

parameterdescription.para: Element 0-based index corresponding to FD1, FD2, FD3, FD4

briefdescription.para: Disables all FIFO slots data sources.
Reads all data available in FIFO.

parameterdescription.para: Buffer to store FIFO data. Should be at least 32*3*elementsPerSample (max 384 bytes)
Number of elements per sample. Depends on values written to FD1-FD4

briefdescription.para: Set FIFO almost full interrupt options.

parameterdescription.para: 1-bit: 0: A_FULL interrupt does not get cleared by FIFO_DATA register read. It gets cleared by status register read. 1: A_FULL interrupt gets cleared by FIFO_DATA register read or status register read.

briefdescription.para: Set FIFO almost full flag options.

parameterdescription.para: 1-bit: 0: Assert on a_full condition, clear by status reg read, and re-assert on subsequent samples 1: Assert on a_full condition, clear by status reg read, and not re-assert on subsequent samples

briefdescription.para: Set whether FIFO rolls over when full.

parameterdescription.para: 1-bit: 0: No rollover - FIFO stop on full 1: Rollover - FIFO auto rolls over on full

briefdescription.para: Set FIFO almost full value (i.e. how many samples till interrupt is triggered)

parameterdescription.para: Remaining FIFO space before intr trigger

briefdescription.para: Put chip into power-save mode. Registers retain their values.
This performs full power-on-reset. All registers are reset.
Set PPG sample rate and pulse rate. NOTE: If rate cant be acheived, then highest available will be selected.
Set PPG sample averaging. Will average and decimate adjacent samples.
Sets the IR ADC count that triggers the beginning of the PPG mode.
Get part ID. Should be 0x1E for this part.
Register driver for MAX86150 ECG/PPG IC.
